title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Complete the in class assignment and record your findings on propulsion.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Use the crucible in the labs to perform your combustion and record your findings.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Follow the guidelines presented in class to design a test nozzle in TinkerCAD. Submit your work here.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Multiple choice quiz on units 2 and 3.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Complete your flow lab and record your findings. Report the analysis for your findings and submit here.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Use the crucible in the labs to perform your heating and record your findings.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Use the information taught in class to come up with 3 well built structural designs and submit your work here.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Complete the attached worksheet and submit a PDF of your work. Please show your work.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Exam over units 1 through 7. It will be mulitple choice with 3 written questions.
